column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Britney - Thank you very much for the folow-up review. I'm happy we met your satisfaction again
column2: but regret that we no longer rank as your #1. We can only hope to reclaim that spot through hard work and more offerings down the road. At any rate
column3: I think you can agree that Houston now has several options for quality ramen and that is a boon for all. Thank you again
